Win a pass to the Advance Screening of The Theory of Everything!

Dear Our Brilliant Fans,

Looking to crack the universe's code for romance? How about taking a date to see The Theory of Everything!

We're giving away double passes for the Stephen Hawking film that's received all sorts of Oscar buzz since it premiered at TIFF. We have tickets for the following Canadian cities:

Victoria (Nov. 19)
Calgary (Nov. 17)
Edmonton (Nov. 19)
Winnipeg (Nov. 20)
Ottawa (Nov. 20)

Enter below for your chance to win.

Good luck!
